summary: Jules Bianchi  was a French racing driver.
full_text: Maximilian Alexander "Max" Chilton  is a British racing driver currently racing for Carlin Motorsport in the Indy Lights series. He made his Formula One debut in 2013, racing for the Marussia F1 Team, having previously raced for the Marussia-backed Carlin GP2 Series team in 2012. His brother Tom is also a racing driver, currently competing in the World Touring Car Championship.
title: Max Chilton
